originalTitle: Flights to northern Ethiopia cancelled as fears mount of renewed conflict
title: Flights to northern Ethiopia cancelled as fears mount of renewed conflict
content: Passengers received a text message about the cancellation of flights, citing "unforeseen circumstances".

originalTitle: Melania Trump documentary not showing in South African cinemas
title: Melania Trump documentary not showing in South African cinemas
content: No reason has been given but the decision follows a huge fall-out between South Africa and the US.

originalTitle: 'The water took everything': Mozambique hit by worst floods in decades
title: 'The water took everything': Mozambique hit by worst floods in decades
content: Nearly 700,000 people have been affected by weeks of severe flooding in Mozambique

originalTitle: UNRWA staff cuts deepen in Gaza as Israel restricts critical aid access
title: UNRWA staff cuts deepen in Gaza as Israel restricts critical aid access
content: Forced austerity: 600 staff laid off, Gaza salaries cut 20%, aid access blocked amid worsening humanitarian crisis.

originalTitle: LIVE: Iran warns retaliation to US attack will not be limited
title: LIVE: Iran warns retaliation to US attack will not be limited
content: Numerous US military assets in the Gulf region are 'within the range of our medium-range missiles', Iran warns.

originalTitle: Can Bangladesh’s Awami League survive election ban, ex-PM Hasina’s exile?
title: Can Bangladesh’s Awami League survive election ban, ex-PM Hasina’s exile?
content: The party that ruled Bangladesh with an iron fist won't be on the ballot in February, and its future is uncertain.

originalTitle: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
title: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
content: Russia has not confirmed it agreed to Trump's request, but Ukraine's president said he expected Vladimir Putin's promise to be kept.

originalTitle: Agents in Minneapolis could be pulled back if local officials cooperate, border tsar says
title: Agents in Minneapolis could be pulled back if local officials cooperate, border tsar says
content: Tom Homan said the immigration operation would be more "targeted", as the Trump administration works to calm frustrations both in the city and on Capitol Hill

originalTitle: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
content: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

originalTitle: Journalist dreams & Keane reunion? How O'Neill continues to revive Celtic
title: Journalist dreams & Keane reunion? How O'Neill continues to revive Celtic
content: Showman Martin O'Neill continues to thrive as Celtic's interim manager as he guides the club through to the Europa League play-off round.

title: Cages, crushes and stabbings - is European away safety getting worse?
content: BBC Sport explores the safety issues fans face when following their team across Europe.

title: Who is 'shy and nervous' Villa match-winner Jimoh-Aloba?
content: Aston Villa match-winner Jamaldeen Jimoh-Aloba is described as "shy and nervous" by Morgan Rogers - but the teenager announced himself on the European stage.
